味.definition: taste; smell; (fig.) (noun suffix) feel; quality; sense; (TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

味之素.definition: Ajinomoto, Japanese food and chemical corporation

味同嚼蠟.definition: lit. tastes as if one is chewing wax (idiom); fig. tasteless; insipid

味噌.definition: miso (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 味噌 "miso"); also pr. [wei4 zeng1]

味道.definition: flavor; taste; (fig.) feeling (of ...); sense (of ...); hint (of ...); (fig.) interest; delight; (dialect) smell; odor
